options.description: Enable CORS by returning correct headers

responseParameters.method.response.header.Access-Control-Al: 'Content-Type,X-Amz-Date,Authorization,X-IO-Blackbox'
'GET, HEAD, POST, PUT, DELETE, CONNECT, OPTIONS, TRACE, PATCH'

post.description: Creates a Transaction object, where the consumer receives a text message with a link to their loan application. While only several parameters are required, providing more data improves the consumer experience and merchant reporting.

202.description: Accepted, but some fields were dropped due to invalid inputs. Errors can be found on response message tag, beginning with "The following fields have been dropped".

get.summary: Retrieve a list of transactions for a merchant
get.description: Retrieves a list of Transaction objects for a given merchant filtered by date range, status, or number of items.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of transactions to return.

parameters.name: startingAfter
parameters.description: List only transactions that were initiated after this date.

parameters.name: endingBefore
parameters.description: List only transactions that were initiated before this date.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: List only transactions with this UI-friendly status. See the enumeration of the supported values in the "status" attribute in the response documentation of this endpoint.

options.description: Enable CORS by returning correct headers
